attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live in a Globalised business community. Economic Cycles have their economic downturns. I hereby propose the creation of an Economic Crisis Management Team to oversee the economic downturn and to restore confidence to the market till we are out of the recessionary cycle. 
This will allow the Government of the day to be more focussed to manage the economic turbulence that we are experiencing. The Crisis team shall work with the Tri Partite System and advise the PM on coherent fiscal and monetary considerations. 
The Crisis Management team to have full remit to explore new business initiatives and state owned entrepreneurial initiatives that would bring new wealth to this nation state. The team shall compliment economic policy initiatives and entrepreneurship   within the United Kingdom and shall advise on all markets and industrial sectors.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
